model.name: PATIENT_HISTORY
model.metadata:
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE ER_VISIT ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"id"', NATIVE_TYPE 'int4'), patientId integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"patientId"', NATIVE_TYPE 'int4'), visitDate timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"visitDate"', NATIVE_TYPE 'timestamp'), diagnosis string(2147483647) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"diagnosis"', NATIVE_TYPE 'text'), CONSTRAINT ER_VISIT_pkey PRIMARY KEY(id), CONSTRAINT er_fk_patient FOREIGN KEY(patientId) REFERENCES PATIENT(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ER_VISIT"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE');
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE PATIENT ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"id"', NATIVE_TYPE 'int4'), firstName string(2147483647) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"firstName"', NATIVE_TYPE 'text'), lastName string(2147483647) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"lastName"', NATIVE_TYPE 'text'), gender string(2147483647) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"gender"', NATIVE_TYPE 'gender_type'), birthDate timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"birthDate"', NATIVE_TYPE 'timestamp'), age integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"age"', NATIVE_TYPE 'int4'), highBpHistory boolean NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"highBpHistory"', NATIVE_TYPE 'bool'), smokingHistory boolean NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"smokingHistory"', NATIVE_TYPE 'bool'), currentSmoker boolean NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"currentSmoker"', NATIVE_TYPE 'bool'), medication string(2147483647) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"medication"', NATIVE_TYPE 'text'), diagnosticCode string(2147483647) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"diagnosticCode"', NATIVE_TYPE 'text'), lastPrimaryCareVisit timestamp OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"lastPrimaryCareVisit"', NATIVE_TYPE 'timestamp'), CONSTRAINT PATIENT_pkey PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PATIENT"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE');

model.name: DEVICES_VBL
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW Measurements ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'id', NATIVE_TYPE 'int', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), dateRead string NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'dateRead', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), dia integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'dia', NATIVE_TYPE 'int', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), glucoseLabel string NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'glucoseLabel', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), glucoseType string NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'glucoseType', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), glucoseValue integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'glucoseValue', NATIVE_TYPE 'int', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), mam string NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'mam', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), map integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'map', NATIVE_TYPE 'int', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), note string OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'note', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), patientId integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'patientId', NATIVE_TYPE 'int', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), pulse integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'pulse', NATIVE_TYPE 'int', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), sys integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'sys', NATIVE_TYPE 'int', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT PK_ID PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'BPGLevel', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_TTL" '0') AS SELECT * FROM DEVICES.Measurements;

model.name: ICD10CM
ICD10CM_VBL
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW index ( code string(4000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'code', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), title string(4000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'title', UPDATABLE 'FALSE') ) AS SELECT A.code AS code, A.title AS title FROM (EXEC ICD10CM.getTextFiles('icd10cm.xml')) AS f, XMLTABLE('/ICD10CM.index/letter/mainTerm' PASSING XMLPARSE(DOCUMENT f.file) COLUMNS code string PATH 'code/text()', title string PATH 'title/text()') AS A;

model.name: PATIENT360
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW PATIENT ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), dateRead string NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), dia integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), glucoseLabel string NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), glucoseType string NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), glucoseValue integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), mam string NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), map integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), note string OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), pulse integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), sys integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), firstName string(2147483647) NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), lastName string(2147483647) NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), gender string(2147483647) NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), birthDate string, age integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), highBpHistory string, smokingHistory string, currentSmoker string, medication string(2147483647) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), diagnosticCode string(2147483647) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), lastPrimaryCareVisit string, title string(4000) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT idDateRead_PK PRIMARY KEY(id, dateRead) ) OPTIONS(MATERIALIZED 'TRUE', UPDATABLE 'TRUE', MATERIALIZED_TABLE 'PatientMatCache.Patient', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_AFTER_LOAD_SCRIPT" 'execute PatientMatCache.native(''swap cache names'');', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_SHARE_SCOPE" 'VDB', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_TTL" '10000', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_BEFORE_LOAD_SCRIPT" 'execute PatientMatCache.native(''truncate cache'');', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_LOAD_SCRIPT" 'insert into PatientMatCache.Patient select * from PATIENT360.PATIENT OPTION NOCACHE;') AS SELECT l.id, l.dateRead, l.dia, l.glucoseLabel, l.glucoseType, l.glucoseValue, l.mam, l.map, l.note, l.pulse, l.sys, p.firstName, p.lastName, p.gender, convert(p.birthDate, string) AS birthDate, p.age, convert(p.highBpHistory, string) AS highBpHistory, convert(p.smokingHistory, string) AS smokingHistory, convert(p.currentSmoker, string) AS currentSmoker, p.medication, p.diagnosticCode, convert(p.lastPrimaryCareVisit, string) AS lastPrimaryCareVisit, i.title FROM PATIENT_HISTORY_VBL.PATIENT AS p LEFT OUTER JOIN DEVICES_VBL.Measurements AS l ON p.id = l.patientId, ICD10CM_VBL.index AS i WHERE p.diagnosticCode = i.code;

model.name: PATIENT_HISTORY_VBL
model.metadata:
CREATE VIEW ER_VISIT ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"id"', NATIVE_TYPE 'int4', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), patientId integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"patientId"', NATIVE_TYPE 'int4', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), visitDate timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"visitDate"', NATIVE_TYPE 'timestamp', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), diagnosis string(2147483647) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"diagnosis"', NATIVE_TYPE 'text', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT ER_VISIT_pkey PRIMARY KEY(id), CONSTRAINT er_fk_patient FOREIGN KEY(patientId) REFERENCES PATIENT(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ER_VISIT"') AS SELECT * FROM PATIENT_HISTORY.ER_VISIT;
CREATE VIEW PATIENT ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"id"', NATIVE_TYPE 'int4', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), firstName string(2147483647) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"firstName"', NATIVE_TYPE 'text', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), lastName string(2147483647) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"lastName"', NATIVE_TYPE 'text', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), gender string(2147483647) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"gender"', NATIVE_TYPE 'gender_type', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), birthDate timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"birthDate"', NATIVE_TYPE 'timestamp', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), age integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"age"', NATIVE_TYPE 'int4', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), highBpHistory boolean NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"highBpHistory"', NATIVE_TYPE 'bool', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), smokingHistory boolean NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"smokingHistory"', NATIVE_TYPE 'bool', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), currentSmoker boolean NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"currentSmoker"', NATIVE_TYPE 'bool', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), medication string(2147483647) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"medication"', NATIVE_TYPE 'text', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), diagnosticCode string(2147483647) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"diagnosticCode"', NATIVE_TYPE 'text', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), lastPrimaryCareVisit timestamp OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"lastPrimaryCareVisit"', NATIVE_TYPE 'timestamp', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT PATIENT_pkey PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PATIENT"') AS SELECT * FROM PATIENT_HISTORY.PATIENT;

model.name: DEVICES
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE Measurements ( BPGLevelObject object OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'this', NATIVE_TYPE 'com.redhat.summit.demo.datagrid.domain.BPGLevel', SELECTABLE 'FALSE', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'id', NATIVE_TYPE 'int'), dateRead string NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'dateRead', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String'), dia integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'dia', NATIVE_TYPE 'int'), glucoseLabel string NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'glucoseLabel', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String'), glucoseType string NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'glucoseType', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String'), glucoseValue integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'glucoseValue', NATIVE_TYPE 'int'), mam string NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'mam', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String'), map integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'map', NATIVE_TYPE 'int'), note string OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'note', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String'), patientId integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'patientId', NATIVE_TYPE 'int'), pulse integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'pulse', NATIVE_TYPE 'int'), sys integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'sys', NATIVE_TYPE 'int'), CONSTRAINT PK_ID PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'BPGLevel', UPDATABLE 'TRUE');
